EmailTemplate.subject: Is network lag letting your customers down?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Don’t let network lag impact your customers Take control of your peering edge with better traffic visibility, optimization and automation. Eliminate network lag and latency to deliver faster response times and better experiences for your customers. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
